Class CartesianDistComparator

java.lang.Object
CartesianDistComparator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparator<GraphNode>
public class CartesianDistComparator extends Object implements Comparator<GraphNode>
Compares two GraphNodes based on their angle and distance from another (reference) GraphNode. The reference node has to be set before comparing!

Main idea: all points that have similar angle from the reference node are close to each other. If they share the same angle, then they're close, if their distances from the reference node is similar. The angle has to be from the whole range, so [-PI,+PI] is sufficient (since the "length" of the interval is the length of the period, which is 2*PI) - Math.atan2(x,y) does exactly what needed The reference node should be paris
